plot_pop¶

StaticMap.plot_pop()¶

Plot populated areas for given countries.

Plot populated areas (capitals, major cities and towns) of the countries defined in the pop_areas attribute. Data is retrieved from the natural earth dataset http://www.naturalearthdata.com/.
